title: Cayenne – a warm and friendly typeface
content:
I’m happy to release Cayenne, an all caps hand-lettered font in three weights, two dotted versions and an outline and an inline font.

You can get the font family at [MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415081353/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/luxus/cayenne/) for a special introduction price of $29.

Hope you like it!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415081353im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Cayenne1_5390.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415081353im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Cayenne2_6142.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415081353im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Cayenne3_3480.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415081353im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Cayenne4_3728.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415081353im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Cayenne5_6371.jpg)
author: luxus

comments.content: Hans, the word "nicley" should be spelled "nicely".
Thanks, George. What a stupid misspelling. But somehow I can not edit the post and upload an corrected image!?

\*A corrected image ;)

As far as I know the feature to edit posts disappeared a while ago. I think it will come back, but I haven't been here for a while so others will know better.

Beautiful typeface and nice styles.
